item.title: D claws are 2 specing how do i change this
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

I’m assuming that the “heavily edited” part doesn’t apply to special attacks so in combatAssistant search for

then search for the dragon claws item id, then you should see something like this

[code]case 14484:
c.gfx0(1950);
c.objectDistance = 7;
c.startAnimation(10961);
c.specAccuracy = 1.96;
c.specDamage = 1.37;
c.clawDamage = 0;

        if (c.playerIndex > 0) {
        	Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex];
        	if (Misc.random(calculateMeleeAttack()) > Misc.random(o.getCombat().calculateMeleeDefence())) {
        		c.clawDamage = Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit() + Misc.random(4));
        	}
        	c.clawIndex = c.playerIndex;
        	c.clawType = 1;
        } else if (c.npcIndex > 0) {
        	NPC n = Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcIndex];
        	if (Misc.random(calculateMeleeAttack()) > Misc.random(n.defence)) {
        		c.clawDamage = Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit() + Misc.random(2));
        	}
        	c.clawIndex = c.npcIndex;
        	c.clawType = 2;
        }
		
		c.doubleHit = true;
		c.usingClaws = true;
		c.specEffect = 5;
		c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase());
		break;[/code]

you would change this bit of code c.specDamage = 1.37; to something lower.

Read full topic
